keyword: calories in in n out double double
title: Calories in In-N-Out Double Double
meta_description: Learn calories in In-N-Out Double Double burger, including full nutrition facts like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick variations for your meal tracking.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out Double-Double: two beef patties, two cheese slices, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out Double-Double provides 670 kcal with 37 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out Double Double?
What's the protein in In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: About 37 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: 41 g total fat (20 g saturated) and 1440 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: 39 g carbs, including 3 g fiber and 10 g sugars, mostly from the bun.

faqs.q: How does customizing affect calories in In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: Swapping bun for lettuce saves ~240 kcal; animal style adds ~190 kcal.
